blogPost.excerpt: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
blogPost.body: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
blogPost.title: Akin - Replace personas with data driven clusters through surveys
blogPost.author: Sam Straun

localize.description: 营销、用户体验设计和研究中使用的角色通常是基于假设或刻板印象的。Akin可以让您用一个调查来替换旧的角色。创建或上传调查和细分，找到趋势和洞察力，而无需聘请数据科学家或顾问。
localize.tagline: 通过调查，用数据驱动的群组代替角色

localize.description: 營銷、用戶體驗設計和研究中使用的角色通常是基於假設或刻板印象的。Akin可以讓您用一個調查來替換舊的角色。創建或上傳調查和細分，找到趨勢和洞察力，而無需聘請數據科學家或顧問。
localize.tagline: 通過調查，用數據驅動的羣組代替角色

previous.excerpt: Pastimes is a mobile app and community that makes it easy to connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts.
previous.title: Pastimes - Find friends who do your favorite activities

localize.description: Pastimes 是一款移动应用和社区，让你轻松与志同道合的户外爱好者建立联系。
localize.tagline: 寻找做你喜欢的活动的朋友

localize.description: Pastimes 是一款移動應用和社區，讓你輕鬆與志同道合的戶外愛好者建立聯繫。
localize.tagline: 尋找做你喜歡的活動的朋友

next.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
next.title: Soapbox Minis - Social audio just got a whole lot better, with mini games

localize.description: 介绍一下Minis，允许用户在房间里直接添加游戏、投票或其他互动组件。迷你版增加了当前对话的内容，并提供了新的话题。第一批迷你版包括民意测验、你愿意吗和随机选择。
localize.tagline: 社交音讯变得更好了，有了小游戏。

localize.description: 介紹一下Minis，允許用戶在房間裏直接添加遊戲、投票或其他互動組件。迷你版增加了當前對話的內容，並提供了新的話題。第一批迷你版包括民意測驗、你願意嗎和隨機選擇。
localize.tagline: 社交音訊變得更好了，有了小遊戲。
